name: Bob (dos)
description:
Bob was a square. A very squary square.

Bob could grow. And shrink.

That's pretty much what made him interesting enough to make a game about him.

Controls:
- WASD or left analog: move the pivot point.
- arrows, right analog or triggers: grow & shrink.
- backspace or second gamepad button (B): restart the level.
- F to toggle fullscreen, M to toggle audio mute

Credits:
- code: dos
- art: dos
- music: dos
- voice over: dos
- story: dos
- level design: dos
- idea guy: dos

Used assets:
- 07579 heaven voices intro.wav by Robinhood76
- watercolor splash by Agata Nawrot

Written in C using libsuperderpy and Allegro 5.
Physics engine: VelocityRaptor

PS. If you like it, I'll be glad to take some of your moneys as a token of appreciation. Thank you!
